faqs.question: Yintoni iTaxEasy_ZA?
faqs.answer: I-TaxEasy_ZA sisixhobo sokubala irhafu esisimahla esiyilelwe ngokukodwa abahlawuli berhafu baseMzantsi Afrika. Ikunceda ukuba uqikelele uxanduva lwakho lwerhafu yengeniso kwaye uqonde izinto ezahlukeneyo onokuzikhupha kwirhafu.

faqs.question: Ngaba idatha yam yobuqu ikhuselekile?
faqs.answer: Ewe, ngokupheleleyo. I-TaxEasy_ZA ihambelana ne-POPIA kwaye ayigcini okanye ayiqokeleli nayiphi na idatha yakho yobuqu. Zonke izibalo zenziwa kwi-browser yakho.

faqs.question: Nguwuphi unyaka werhafu olu qikelelo oluwugubungelayo?
faqs.answer: Isixhobo sokubala senzelwe unyaka werhafu ka-2025 (1 Matshi 2024 ukuya ku-28 Februwari 2025) kusetyenziswa iitafile zerhafu zakutshanje ze-SARS kunye namazinga.

faqs.question: Zithini iikhowudi ze-IRP5 kwaye ndingazifumana phi?
faqs.answer: Iikhowudi ze-IRP5 ziikhowudi ezisemgangathweni ezisetyenziswa yi-SARS ukuhlela iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zengeniso kunye nezinto ezikhutshwayo. Ungazifumana ezi khowudi kwisatifikethi sakho se-IRP5 esinikezelwe ngumqeshi wakho.

faqs.question: Zisebenza njani iikhredithi zerhafu zoncedo lwezonyango?
faqs.answer: Iikhredithi zerhafu zoncedo lwezonyango ziikhredithi zenyanga ezinciphisa uxanduva lwakho lwerhafu. Ngo-2025, iikhredithi ziyi-R347 ngenyanga kumalungu aphambili kunye nomntu oxhomekeke kuye wokuqala, kunye ne-R234 kubaxhomekeke kubo abongezelelweyo.

faqs.question: Yintoni umda weminikelo yengxowa-mali yomhlalaphantsi?
faqs.answer: Ngo-2025, unokukhupha ukuya kwi-27.5% yengeniso yakho okanye ingeniso erhafiswayo, enomda kwi-R350,000 ngonyaka kuzo zonke iingxowa-mali zomhlalaphantsi.

faqs.question: Irhafiswa njani imali yohambo?
faqs.answer: Iimali zohambo zirhafiswa ngokupheleleyo njengengeniso (Ikhowudi 3701). Nangona kunjalo, unokubanga iindleko zohambo lweshishini njengezinto ezikhutshwayo ukuba ugcina incwadi yohambo.

faqs.question: Ndingazibanga iindleko zeofisi yasekhaya?
faqs.answer: Ewe, ukuba usebenza ekhaya rhoqo kumqeshi wakho okanye uqhuba ishishini ekhaya. Ukukhutshwa kubalwa ngokusekelwe kwindawo yomgangatho esetyenziselwa kuphela iinjongo zeshishini.

faqs.question: Zithini izinto ezikhutshwayo zamandla ahlaziyekayo?
faqs.answer: Icandelo 12B livumela ukukhutshwa kwe-100% kwezifudumezi zamanzi zelanga ezifanelekileyo kunye neepaneli ze-photovoltaic ngonyaka wofakelo, ngokuxhomekeke kwiimeko ezithile.

faqs.question: Irhafiswa njani ingeniso yokuqeshisa?
faqs.answer: Ingeniso yokuqeshisa irhafiswa ngokupheleleyo, kodwa unokukhupha iindleko ezifana nenzala yebhondi, irhafu, i-inshurensi, ukulungiswa, kunye nokuhla kwexabiso (5% ngonyaka kwizakhiwo).

faqs.question: Ngaba kukho ukukhutshwa kwenzala?
faqs.answer: Ewe, ngo-2025 ukukhutshwa konyaka kuyi-R23,800 kubantu abangaphantsi kwe-65 kunye ne-R34,500 kwabo baneminyaka engama-65 nangaphezulu.

faqs.question: Ngaba izabelo azirhafiswa?
faqs.answer: Izabelo zasekhaya zinekhutshwa lonyaka le-R30,000 kubantu. Izixa ezingaphezulu kwesi zixhomekeke kwirhafu yezabelo kwi-20%.

faqs.question: Ndingazikhupha iintlawulo zobulungu bobungcali?
faqs.answer: Ewe, iintlawulo zobulungu bobungcali kunye neendleko ze-CPD ziyakhuphwa phantsi kwecandelo 11(a) ukuba zinxulumene ngokuthe ngqo nemisebenzi yakho yokufumana ingeniso.

faqs.question: Yintoni umda weminikelo yesisa?
faqs.answer: Iminikelo kwizinto ezivunyiweyo yi-SARS (icandelo 18A) iyakhutshwa ukuya kwi-10% yengeniso yakho erhafiswayo.

faqs.question: Zisebenza njani izaphulelo zerhafu ezinxulumene neminyaka?
faqs.answer: Ngo-2025: Isaphulelo sokuqala R17,235 (yonke iminyaka), Isaphulelo sesibini R9,444 (65+), Isaphulelo sesithathu R3,145 (75+). Ezi zaphulelo zinciphisa uxanduva lwakho lwerhafu ngokuthe ngqo.
